name: Sif
temple_description:
Sif was the god of land and harvest in Norse mythology and the personification of harvest grains. She had beautiful blonde hair, which hangs from her head to her toes. People described her blonde hair as a symbol of golden wheat or the gold buried in the ground.
Because of her outstanding beauty, she is considered one of most beautiful among the Norse gods, second only to Freyja.

active_skills.name: Mesmerizing Blonde
active_skills.effect: Enters [Excite] state, increases self DEF by 50% and self ATK by 25% for 3 rounds

active_skills.name: Thunder Spear
active_skills.effect: 60% chance to inflict [Sunder Armor], decreasing enemies' DEF by 60% for 2 rounds
